name: Road Trip To Grandma's
description:
"Procedurally generated seconds, minutes, maybe even hours of fun."

-Me

Grandma invited you to dinner but first you have to get through the desert. Don't hit the edge of the screen, there always seem to be deer just out of sight.

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right arrow keys to turn

R to restart

Q to quit

Developed during Train Jam 2019 Limited Extra Circuitous Edition.
